item.title: Hannover Messe 2021: Why it is worth attending this year especially
item.dc:creator: Maria Pascual
item.description:
The reason why we recommend attending the Hannover Messe is very simple: what happens if what you are looking for your manufacturing facilities are solutions to problems such as obtaining easily your assets' traceability, or the history of each assets and make it accessible and maintained easily and quickly, integrated with you the software you need in your facilities?

The post Hannover Messe 2021: Why it is worth attending this year especially appeared first on TicTAP.
item.content:encoded:
The Hannover Messe is the most important industrial fair of the year and can mark a before and after in your production plant or in the products you manufacture. In it you can find solutions to production problems, or improvements that help you improve productivity, and therefore the benefits of your company.

The Hannover convention and trade show is digital this year. So, there is no longer an excuse to miss out on all that it can contribute to your products and their manufacture.

Why should you attend the Hannover Messe 2021?

The reason why we recommend attending the Hannover Messe is
very simple: If in your factory or production plants you are
experiencing unwanted problems that require an already existing and
highly standardized solution in the market, it will not be difficult for
you to find it. But, what happens when what you are looking for are
solutions to problems such as obtaining the identification of assets or
their complete traceability and easily, saving a history record that can
be accessed and maintained easily and quickly?
If you don’t have an acquaintance, consultant, or vendor to call that
have no solution for you, the first thing you’ll probably do is open
your browser and start looking.

But as you can imagine, or even have already suffered, finding the
results you are looking for is not easy.

The search engine gives you thousands of results related to your
search. The issue begins to get complicated. And above all, you do not
know if you are obtaining in these results everything that the market
really offers, or if they contain the most convenient solution for your
production, or if the products and solutions found are those that have
the most future expectations, etc.

Our recommendation is that if you want to find solutions to problems
in your daily production, or to help you make it profitable, it is highly
advisable to consider where the industry is going, and thus be able to
apply solutions with more future to the problems and tasks that you
face in your factory every day. That is why we invite you to join the
Hannover Messe 2021.

As a summary for those unfamiliar with Hannover Messe, it is the
largest industrial fair in the world. It takes place in Germany,
specifically in Hannover, and has more than 6,000 exhibitors and
200,000 visitors.

Hannover Messe 2021 is online

Best of all, this year there is no excuse to miss Hannover Messe 2021
because it comes in digital format. So, you can
access exhibitors, conferences and networking from wherever you are.

Therefore, we would like to invite you to seize the opportunity and join this first
digital edition of the Hannover Messe, the most important industrial fair of the year. You will find us there, since TicTAP will also be
present in it as an innovative and disruptive solution for:

  • Identification of assets (machines, parts, vehicles, train wagons
    …)
  • Asset traceability
  • Maintenance of assets, machinery and facilities
  • Generation of history of easy access and simple to maintain and update.
    One click reports.
  • Incidental management.
  • Aftermarket.
  • Sensor platform integration.
  • Existing ERP integrations.
  • Plug & Play BI OEE tools.

To sum up, if you are facing any of the problems and needs
mentioned in this article, we recommend you to sign up now for
Hannover Messe 2021.

There you will find us in the TicTAP digital display, where we will be able to
answer all your questions, show you our solution in more detail and
how it can be easily adapted to your manufacturing process and
products.

More information about Hannover Messe 2021

You can find all the information about Hannover Messe 2021 on the
official website.

The post Hannover Messe 2021: Why it is worth attending this year especially appeared first on TicTAP.
